title: Arizona Sunshine 2 Co-Op Is A Bloody Good Time!
description:
In this video I give you an early look at some Arizona Sunshine 2 Co-Op gameplay. Arizona Sunshine 2 is easily my most anticipated VR game of 2023.

Check out Arizona Sunshine 2 on Quest here;
https://www.meta.com/en-gb/experiences/5245041552210029

Check out Arizona Sunshine 2 on Steam here;
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1540210/Arizona_Sunshine_2

Check out Arizona Sunshine 2 on PSVR 2 here;
https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10008622

Thanks to Vertigo Games for providing early access to Arizona Sunshine 2 VR for this gameplay preview. 

Let me know what you all think of this Arizona Sunshine 2 VR Co-Op gameplay in the comments below...

Thanks for watching []-)
